message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you have. I'm looking for a price of $16,000 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $16,000 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you do $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $14,000 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford. I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  What do you think?
